# optimization.integration.__init__

**Source:** `src\optimization\integration\__init__.py`

## Module Overview

PSO-Factory Integration Module.

Provides advanced integration between PSO optimization and controller factory patterns.

## Dependencies

This module imports:

- `from .pso_factory_bridge import EnhancedPSOFactory, PSOFactoryConfig, ControllerType, create_optimized_controller_factory, optimize_classical_smc, optimize_adaptive_smc, optimize_sta_smc`
